TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit DynamicDataExtensions extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides extension methods that are used by ASP.NET Dynamic Data.

MemberSignature.Value: public static object ConvertEditedValue (this System.Web.DynamicData.IFieldFormattingOptions formattingOptions, string value);
.method public static hidebysig object ConvertEditedValue(class System.Web.DynamicData.IFieldFormattingOptions formattingOptions, string value) cil managed

Docs.param: The formatting options object, as defined by the object.
The input value to be converted.
Docs.summary: Returns the value provided by a user for a control that is being validated.
Docs.returns: if is or an empty string and the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.IFieldFormattingOptions.ConvertEmptyStringToNull%2A> property of is ; if is not or an empty string and matches the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.IFieldFormattingOptions.NullDisplayText%2A> property of ; otherwise, the unchanged value of .

remarks.format:
## Remarks For information about formatting options, see the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.IFieldFormattingOptions> type overview.
## Examples The following example shows how to use the ConvertEditedValue method. The example gets user input from a field template that is configured to accept date-time data. In the DynamicData\FieldTemplates\DateTime_Edit.ascx.cs or DynamicData\FieldTemplates\DateTime_Edit.ascx.vb file, the method converts empty strings to `null`.
[!code-cs[System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions#3](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/1ef0bca6-aaf5-492d-acd1-_1.cs)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static void EnablePersistedSelection (this System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl dataBoundControl);
.method public static hidebysig void EnablePersistedSelection(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl dataBoundControl) cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Use the EnablePersistedSelection property on a databound control such as GridView or ListView.")

Docs.param: The data bound control.
Docs.summary: Enables selection to be persisted in data controls that support selection and paging.

remarks.format:
## Remarks In controls that extend <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl> and that support selection, paging, and sorting, calling this method enables the control to persist selection even when the selected row is not visible. For example, if the user selects a row and then pages to another page, or if the user sorts the data, the selected row remains selected. If this method is not called, selection is lost when the user pages or sorts.
The <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataManager.RegisterControl%2A> method calls EnablePersistedSelection.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void ExpandDynamicWhereParameters (this System.Web.DynamicData.IDynamicDataSource dataSource);
.method public static hidebysig void ExpandDynamicWhereParameters(class System.Web.DynamicData.IDynamicDataSource dataSource) cil managed

Docs.param: The data source object.
Docs.summary: Expands dynamic filters into parameters that are usable by the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method expands the values of the current instances of the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicControlParameter> and <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicQueryStringParameter> controls into `Where` parameters that are usable in queries by the data source.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Web.DynamicData.IDynamicDataSource FindDataSourceControl (this System.Web.UI.Control current);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Web.DynamicData.IDynamicDataSource FindDataSourceControl(class System.Web.UI.Control current) cil managed

Docs.param: A control inside the hierarchy of a data-bound control whose containing control you want to find.
Docs.summary: Returns the data source that is associated with the data control for the specified control.
Docs.returns: The data source that is associated with the data control for the specified control.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example shows how to find the containing data source control. In the example, the Dynamic Data page templates are copied to the \DynamicData\CustomPages\ProductDescriptions folder to provide a custom display for the ProductDescription table of the AdventureWorksLT database. The Insert.aspx file markup is changed to add an `OnDataBound` event handler named `DetailsView1_DataBound`, in which the FindDataSourceControl method is called to find the data source control.
[!code-cs[System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/891f3768-5749-4318-8a27-_1.cs)] [!code-cs[System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions#2](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/891f3768-5749-4318-8a27-_2.aspx)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Web.UI.Control FindFieldTemplate (this System.Web.UI.Control control, string columnName);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Web.UI.Control FindFieldTemplate(class System.Web.UI.Control control, string columnName) cil managed

Docs.param: The containing control.
The name of the column.
Docs.summary: Returns the field template for the specified column in the specified control's naming container.
Docs.returns: The field template for the specified column in the specified control's naming container.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example shows how to find the text box control for a specified column name. In example, the Dynamic Data page templates are copied to the \DynamicData\CustomPages\ProductDescriptions folder to provide a custom display for the ProductDescription table of the AdventureWorksLT database. The Insert.aspx file markup is changed to add an `OnDataBound` event handler named `DetailsView1_DataBound`, in which the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions.FindDataSourceControl%2A> method is called to find a text box control.
[!code-cs[System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/a9a49ffb-dded-4e65-a1d7-_1.cs)] [!code-cs[System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions#2](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/a9a49ffb-dded-4e65-a1d7-_2.aspx)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Web.DynamicData.MetaTable FindMetaTable (this System.Web.UI.Control current);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Web.DynamicData.MetaTable FindMetaTable(class System.Web.UI.Control current) cil managed

Docs.param: The current control.
Docs.summary: Returns the metatable object for the containing data control.
Docs.returns: The metatable object for the containing data control.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example shows how to find the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.MetaTable> object for a control. In the example, the Dynamic Data page templates are copied to the \DynamicData\CustomPages\ProductDescriptions folder to provide a custom display for the ProductDescription table of the AdventureWorksLT database. The Insert.aspx file markup is changed to add an `OnDataBound` event handler named `DetailsView1_DataBound`, in which the FindMetaTable method is called to find the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.MetaTable> object.
[!code-cs[System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/287a14db-c680-4865-9ec7-_1.cs)] [!code-cs[System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions#2](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/287a14db-c680-4865-9ec7-_2.aspx)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static string FormatEditValue (this System.Web.DynamicData.IFieldFormattingOptions formattingOptions, object fieldValue);
.method public static hidebysig string FormatEditValue(class System.Web.DynamicData.IFieldFormattingOptions formattingOptions, object fieldValue) cil managed

Docs.param: The instance to use.
The field value to format.
Docs.summary: Formats the specified field value by using the specified formatting options.
Docs.returns: The field value that has been formatted by using the specified formatting options.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The FormatEditValue method is like the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions.FormatValue%2A> method, but it is used when the field is in edit mode.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Type GetEnumType (this System.Web.DynamicData.MetaColumn column);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Type GetEnumType(class System.Web.DynamicData.MetaColumn column) cil managed

Docs.param: The column to get the enumeration type for.
Docs.summary: Gets the type of the enumeration that represents the column.
Docs.returns: The type of the enumeration that represents the column if the underlying type is an enumeration; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks The column represents an enumeration if the underlying type is an enumeration or if the column is annotated in the entity partial class with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.EnumDataTypeAttribute> attribute.
